review_data.title: Epic bar with great music and great service from Dominic
review_data.content: Epic bar with great music and great service from Dominic Nice beers and great place to sit outside and watch the world go by

review_data.title: Worst service in Zurich. Yes,
review_data.content: Worst service in Zurich. Yes, it’s that bad! Zurich is not exactly renowned for great table service but this place takes it to a whole new level. Lower! The first time we visited and sat right next to the door, the waitresses just didn’t take...More

review_data.title: Empanadas um Mitternacht
review_data.content: Beste argentinische Empanandas in town. Sehr gute und aufgestellte Bedienung. Tolle Musik. Trendig. Herrlicher Ort für Sommerabende.

review_data.title: Outside dinner with a view ..
review_data.content: The drinks were cold, the food would have needed some more spices and the service that evening was short of capacity hence rather slow ...

review_data.title: Besuch
review_data.content: Alles gut bis sehr gut. Die Bedienung und sogar der Wirt immer bester Laune. Komme immer gerne hierher, da ich...More

review_data.title: Feierabend mit Kollegen
review_data.content: Auch in der kälteren Jahreszeit ein guter Ort um sich am Feierabend mit Freunden den Tag ausklingen zu lassen. Netter...More

review_data.title: Small and nice
review_data.content: If you are in the area of Idaplatz, this is a good place to stop by. Small, cozy bar with a local beer from Zurich. You can also tak a snack and sit outside.

review_data.title: Friendly tall gentleman working the bar
review_data.content: The Berta Bar in located across the street from Idaplatz and can be accessed with public transit (Tram #2/#3 Lochergut, Bus #72). I stopped by this small, friendly, cozy bar in the early evening, so Idaplatz was not too busy with families at this time...More

review_data.title: Delicious panini!
review_data.content: The panini was lovely! Crispy crust with a filling of your choice. Very nice in warm weather, because then you can enjoy the chilled atmosphere outside.

review_data.title: Casual bar
review_data.content: Great place to meet for a beer. Quite small inside, but in summertime nice outdoor seating overlooking Idaplatz. Service is nice, not as ignorant as usual in Zurich.

review_data.title: Cosy, casual, relaxed place for cocktails or coffee
review_data.content: Berta Bar is a great place for drinks and conversation any night of the week. It's not a loud place, just right for sitting and having a chat and an excellent caparinha or three (but it's also perfectly acceptable just to have a coffee and...More

review_data.title: Trendig und gut
review_data.content: Die Berta-bar liegt direkt am Idaplatz und im Sommer kann man draussen sitzen, essen und trinken. Die Umgebung ist dabei...More

review_data.title: Best neighbourhood bar in Zurich
review_data.content: During my last stay in Zurich I discovered this little gem of a bar in a friendly neighbourhood. Ask for the "Latte Macchiato" or try one of best "Panini Caldi" I ever had.
